symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.message_text: Have you had a fever in the last 24 hours?

symptoms.name: Quick Breathing
symptoms.message_text: Count how many times you inhale in the next six seconds. Is it greater than 3?

symptoms.name: Sore Throat
symptoms.message_text: Has your throat been sore in the last 24 hours?

symptoms.name: Rhinorrhea
symptoms.message_text: Have you had a runny nose in the last 24 hours?

symptoms.name: Myalgia
symptoms.message_text: Have you had any unexpected muscle pain in the last 24 hours?

symptoms.name: Night Sweats
symptoms.message_text: Have you noticed an abnormal amount of sweating during sleep in the last 24 hours?

symptoms.name: Sputum
symptoms.message_text: Have you had a cough containing mucus in the last 24 hours?

risk_factors.name: Weak Immune System
risk_factors.message_text: Do you have a weakened or supressed immune system?
